MEANINGS.POS_TIP: Noun: A word (other than a pronoun) used to identify any of a class of people, places, or things (common noun), or to name a particular one of these (proper noun).
MEANINGS.DEF_EN: A person or group of people employed to protect an important person from attack or danger.
MEANINGS.DEF_ZH: 受雇保护重要人物免受攻击或危险的人或群体。
MEANINGS.SENT_EN: The president's motorcade was surrounded by highly trained bodyguards.
MEANINGS.SENT_ZH: 总统的车队被训练有素的保镖团团围住。
